channel.title: PI Dialogue (when you first login for the first time)
channel.description:
[code]Hey guys i just need help adding dialogue when you FIRST log in for the first time like when you make a new account and you first login it says, welcome i have a case in dialoguehandler that has the welcome but i don't know how to make it work when you first log in
please help. here's the case.
[code=]case 62: sendNpcChat4("Hello and Welcome to TP2006", "This is a Oldschool pk eco server created", "by TP2006.", "He is the developer.", c.talkingNpc, "TP2006 Tutorial"); c.nextChat = 90; break;[/code]
Etc etc i just put random words :)

item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:

[code]Hey guys i just need help adding dialogue when you FIRST log in for the first time like when you make a new account and you first login it says, welcome i have a case in dialoguehandler that has the welcome but i don’t know how to make it work when you first log in

please help. here’s the case.

case 62: sendNpcChat4("Hello and Welcome to TP2006", "This is a Oldschool pk eco server created", "by TP2006.", "He is the developer.", c.talkingNpc, "TP2006 Tutorial"); c.nextChat = 90; break;
